Package uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation

Interface IFederatedOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Operation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FederatedOperation, GetAllGraphInfo
    @Deprecated
public interface IFederatedOperation
extends Operation
    Deprecated.
    Concept of a FederatedOperation class will not exist from 2.4.0, all federation specifics are handled via operation options.
    Interface for Operations that uses a selection of graphs to be performed.
